ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Observation data of the equatorial lower troposphere taken by the boundary layer radar (BLR)-3 at Kototabang (CSV format)
ResourceHeader.Description: The 10-minute average observation data in the equatorial lower troposphere (1.2-5.5 km) taken by the boundary layer radar (BLR)-3 at Kototabang, Indonesia (0.20S, 100.32E, 865m MSL). The observation data are stored in the CSV (Comma Separated Values) file named (year)(month)(day).(variable).csv. The variable abbreviations are uwnd, vwnd, wwnd, pwr1, pwr2, pwr3, pwr4, pwr5, wdt1, wdt2, wdt3, wdt4 and wdt5, which mean zonal, meridional and vertical wind velocities, echo power and spectral width for beam 1-5, respectively. The azimuth and zenith angles of beam 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 are (0, 0), (0, 10), (90, 10), (180, 10) and (270, 10), respectively, in unit of degree. The numbers of the first line of each file represent altitude, and the second and below are observational local date and time (year/month/day hour:minute) which corresponds to the center time of averaging period and data at each altitude. The value of 999 means missing data. Since the BLR-3 operation stopped due to the breakdown of signal analyzer, the observation database has not been updated now.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: If you acquire the BLR data at the Kototabang station, we ask that you acknowledge us in your use of the data. This may be done by including text such as the BLR data provided by Research Institute for Sustainable Humanosphere of Kyoto University. We would also appreciate receiving a copy of the relevant publications.

TimeSpan.Note: Although the BLR-3 data can be open within a few of day after the observational date, the BLR-3 operation stops now due to the breakdown of signal analyzer.

NumericalData.Keyword: EARTH SCIENCE Atmosphere Atmospheric Winds Boundary Layer Winds

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Description: Date in the form YYYY/MM/DD where YYYY= Gregorian Year AD, MM = month of year (01-12), and DD = day of month (01-31).

Parameter.Name: time
Parameter.Description: Time in the form hh:mm where hh = hour of day (00-23) and mm = minute of hour. Local time (UT+07:00:00) is used for time data.

Parameter.Name: pwr1
Parameter.Description: Echo intensity (arbitrary unit) for beam 1 (azimuth angle:0, zenith angle:0)

Parameter.Name: pwr2
Parameter.Description: Echo intensity (arbitrary unit) for beam 2 (azimuth angle:0, zenith angle:10)

Parameter.Name: pwr3
Parameter.Description: Echo intensity (arbitrary unit) for beam 3 (azimuth angle:90, zenith angle:10)

Parameter.Name: pwr4
Parameter.Description: Echo intensity (arbitrary unit) for beam 4 (azimuth angle:180, zenith angle:10)

Parameter.Name: pwr5
Parameter.Description: Echo intensity (arbitrary unit) for beam 5 (azimuth angle:270, zenith angle:10)

Parameter.Name: wdt1
Parameter.Description: Spectral width (half power full width) for beam 1 (azimuth angle:0, zenith angle:0)

Parameter.Name: wdt2
Parameter.Description: Spectral width (half power full width) for beam 2 (azimuth angle:0, zenith angle:10)

Parameter.Name: wdt3
Parameter.Description: Spectral width (half power full width) for beam 3 (azimuth angle:90, zenith angle:10)

Parameter.Name: wdt4
Parameter.Description: Spectral width (half power full width) for beam 4 (azimuth angle:180, zenith angle:10)

Parameter.Name: wdt5
Parameter.Description: Spectral width (half power full width) for beam 5 (azimuth angle:270, zenith angle:10)
